text: Jean-Claude Viollet (born 9 June 1951 in Ruelle-sur-Touvre, Charente) is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Charente department, from 1997 to 2012 and was a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:People from Charente Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Claude Viollet
